content: this is a great hat for both the beginner and the seasoned knitter this hat is knit from the bottom up and with no increases or decreases the hat is simply seamed together at the top this hat knits up very quickly using bulky/super bulky weight yarn or 3 strands of worsted weight yarn held together use different colours of worsted weight yarn to make a marled hat i love to see your projects please tag me @purlandpineknits and use #purlandpineknits and #theironwoodhat so i can see your progress and finished hat
